data.eml:eml: New Brazilian species of Phoremia Desutter-Grandcolas, 1993 and Zucchiella de Mello, 1990 (Orthoptera: Grylloidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pereira, Marcelo Ribeiro, Lhano, Marcos Gonçalves, Sperber, Carlos Frankl (2011): New Brazilian species of Phoremia Desutter-Grandcolas, 1993 and Zucchiella de Mello, 1990 (Orthoptera: Grylloidea). Zootaxa 2907: 29-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206914
